meanings.definition: A decorative pin worn on the front of a garment.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her grandmother's antique breastpins on her dress.
meanings.sent2: The elegant lady wore a sparkling breastpin on her blouse.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted at the shiny breastpin, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a row of gleaming breastpins, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The collection of unique breastpins sparkled like tiny stars on her outfit.

meanings.sent1: She carefully breastpins her scarf to keep it from blowing away in the wind.
meanings.sent2: He breastpins his badge to his uniform every morning before duty.
meanings.sent3: The magician breastpins the colorful handkerchief to his sleeve for a surprising trick.
meanings.sent4: Her words breastpinned his attention, holding him captivated in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The memory of their laughter breastpinned her heart, keeping it warm on lonely days.
